name: Math Dash (Solo Developer)
description:
Math Dash

This game is made for practicing your math times tables. It is for young and old. This project is still in development. Please download the game and try it out. I would really appreciate all support then leave a comment in the comments below and share this game with your friends. Hope you enjoy it.

Controls:

  • Left and right arrow to chose which side to go.
  • Backspace, number pad on the right and top of the keyboard for answering the question.
  • Space to submit your answer.
